## Nuclear rITS

```{r FigureAppendixggMSArITS, out.extra="angle=90", fig.cap=caption$msa_rITS, fig.scap="Nuclear rITS mutliple sequence alignment"}

caption$msa_rITS <-
  "Mulitple sequence alignment of unique Nuclear rITS sites."

knitr::include_graphics(
  path = fs::path(
    here::here(), "inst/figures/AppendixMSArITS",
    ext = knit_variables$graphics
  )
)

```

\clearpage

## Plastid *rps* Intron

```{r FigureAppendixggMSArpsIntron, out.extra="angle=90", fig.cap=caption$msa_rps, fig.scap="Plastid \\textit{rps} intron mutliple sequence alignment"}

caption$msa_rps <-
  paste0(
    "Mulitple sequence alignment of unique plastid ",
    ifelse(
      grepl(pattern = "html|doxc", x = knit_variables$pandoc),
      "*rps*", "\\textit{rps}"
    ), " sites."
  )

knitr::include_graphics(
  path =fs::path(
    here::here(), "inst/figures/AppendixMSArpsIntron",
    ext = knit_variables$graphics
  )
)

```

\clearpage
